ComicInfo.Characters: Jethro Gruntman,Bill O'Reilly,Claxton Baker,Heinrich von Boffo,Sarah Palin,John McCain,Joe Biden,Joe Bitterman,Dogstar Zamana,John Edwards
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T21:18:18 [Issue ID 4000-146142] urn:comicvine:4000-146142 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 23:39:48. [Issue ID 352968]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Various short satires of pop culture.
Loosely follows the plot of the movie "The Dark Knight."
Fake definitions for words used to describe aspects of the War on Terror.
A look at some possible goofy outcomes of fortune telling.
Minute-by-minute looks at features on "Countdown" taken to their extremes.
John McCain appears in historic paintings and photos of the past 400 years of American history.
Monroe's chemistry experiment blows up in class and the FBI takes him in for interrogation as a terrorist suspect.
A look at the things apes would do wrong if they thought more like people.
The Grey Spy lures the others into a trap, with her feminine wiles.
What might happen if common practices in presidential elections were transfered to high schools.

ComicInfo.Title: The Fundalini Pages; The Dork Knight; Mad's Updated Glossary to The War On Terror; A MAD Look at Fortune Tellers; MAD Deconstructs TV Talk Shows; A Look Back At The Historical Career of John McCain; Monroe and...Domestic Terror; The Strip Club; When Monkeys Go Bad; Spy vs. Spy vs. Spy; When High School Elections Are Run Like Presidential Elections; Drawn-Out Dramas
